segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like a waterfall gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading across the floor, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be ruined if she steps more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter, at least.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at those kids, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that rickety stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting, and he might drop everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, palm out like a beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is so sloppy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
